page.title: 14MANOR FARM BRATTELBY CONT.
page.content: They use the reservoir to irrigate the potatoes and sugarbeet. They have 35 cattle but no bullocks and they have quite a few heifers. They have some Jacob sheep and 22 lambs. Mr. Marris sprays the crops to kill the weeds and insects which keeps them free of disease and which does not harm the plants. The machinery consists of tractors, bailers, drills, irrigation machinery, trailers, ploughs and a sub soiler. The average area harvested in one day is 20 acres and 1-1\ for sugarbeet. There are three men on the farm, his son another man and himself. The Marris have three pets a white pony called Tabboo, and a collie dog called Bess and a cat called Wally. The cattle are fed with crushed barley and whole potatoes. The wheat goes to be made into bread.
